title: FullStack Engineer
content:
주요 업무
                    Full Stack Engineering : Cloud Development and Deployments based on OpenStack and Kubernetes

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          Node.js
          AngularJS
          Front-end
          풀스택개발
          React
          서버관리
          Back-end
          GitHub
          Python
          Amazon AWS

채용 상세
                    담당업무-OpenStack and K8S Monitoring 개발-UI/UX 개발-CI/CD 환경 개발자격요건- Expert Linux system administration and troubleshooting skills- Expert understanding of networking concepts and protocols- Ability to …
            더 보기
            담당업무-OpenStack and K8S Monitoring 개발-UI/UX 개발-CI/CD 환경 개발자격요건- Expert Linux system administration and troubleshooting skills- Expert understanding of networking concepts and protocols- Ability to read and understand Python, Ruby code; good Shell scripting skills- Good knowledge of virtualization solution and network and distributed storage solutions우대사항-Knowledge of OpenStack, Ubuntu MaaS-Experience working w/ and maintaining large Python codebases, w/ Linux HA, w/ databases and message brokers, configuring, customizing, and extending monitoring tools and configuration management tools
